name: Unbridled
description:
Description

Unbridled is a 2D top down adventure game made for Gamedev.js jam. 

------------------------------------------------------------

Theme

The theme is "raw". I took the following definitions of the word:

  1. Feelings or qualities that are raw are natural and difficult to control
  2. A person who is not trained or without experience

The opening level and cutscenes will tell you why the main character fits the two definitions above. The game is about overcoming these two weaknesses. 

You already have all the power you will ever need.

------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

WASD to move

J to shoot 

C to pick up items / progress through dialog
